post.body: Where is Minglewood Hall?
Well, at least now I know what to blame it on.
http://www.comicknits.com/
But is it more awesome than this? http://tinyurl.com/563co5
That NPR show?
It's a great idea. MST3K while you work is one of the best things ever.
This won't help you sleep, but I hope you will enjoy it : http://tinyurl.com/6s5gfh
Hi-5
Does it have something to do with a percentage of people who like comics having poor social skills anyway?
Ohhhhh.. okay. Yeah, I've never heard of either of those.
I still don't understand what's going on. You'd say this if trying to figure out directions?
What does that mean?
Maybe Joel will give me the keys to Destination:Blog! and we can start that back up. We were going to invite you in anyway.
Because the internet doesn't have a doorman. If we could create the software for this we would be rich and respected.
YES!
You said it.
Whaaaa?
Yeah, I wasn't crazy about 4, but 5 has brought me back to more of my original excitement.
How's the putting the logo on the site progress coming?
That comic was called "Kill All Parents" by Image.
Who, disguised as Clark Kent, mild-mannered blogger of news related news from his apartment..
Dude, I want some crazy potato chips.
Huzzah! So how long after newspapers are no longer being published do you think DC will still have him work at the Daily Planet?
Well, if I didn't buy them, and you didn't buy them, who did?
What's wrong with us?
Don't want to give the plot away yet, but it will involve atomic adamantium & atomantium!
I am now working feverishly on my The Atom/Atom Ant/Adam Ant team-up pitch.
Did you hear the word "glaze" used over & over to describe what kind of "street ice" we can look forward to?
Clearly your grandmother is metal.
Everyone needs Portal technology.
Also, no review of Didio's writing is complete w/o the word "puking". Worse than Ultimates 3 making out with Chuck Austen Superman.
I'm going to have to pretend FC and NK are 2 completely different continuities then I think.
Someday we will have a Muppet Christmas party.
If you can't make it thru the SW:Holiday Special, remember, there IS a Rifftrax for it.
I don't know if Michael Caine is the best Scrooge, but Gonzo is definitely the best Charles Dickens.
Where is your Sky Captain fanart?
I didn't know Will Eisner's ghost had perfected Portal technology.
Isn't New Krypton taking place after Final Crisis?
I had no idea you were so in love with Jimmy Fallon.
That's why I have headphones.
Aw sweet! Hooray! Thanks, man!
Sweet!
Most definitely the cutest show ever.
♫Tell me that you want me, tell me that you need me, tell me cuz I'd like to know ♫ http://blip.fm/~13i6h
The real Final Crisis is that I'm out of Junior Mints.
Also, if anyone knows someone who can help us make our site look more like a real site on the cheap, please, please let me know.
Wherein I am sincerely asking you & your internet power for help : http://tinyurl.com/6lxqxq
Also, why is the internet retarded today?
Guh. I hate getting wet going to lunch and then coming back into an office that's got the A/C on in December. DECEMBER!!
is amazed at how quickly a year can go by.
♫ We'll all become magicians and leave the wonder in their eyes : http://tinyurl.com/6xu2e3
This is the thing of which I am trying to do the opposite. The way he puts it makes it sound not so bad though. ♫ http://blip.fm/~11d1f
Ok, internet, we've now done comics about Twilight, Superman being a dick, video games, Clone Wars, & "pee holes". What else do you need?
Thanks to Kate Beaton I've had this song stuck in my head for weeks. ♫ http://blip.fm/~11c3u
I mean, comic-wise. Your mom was the real best thing I've ever done.
When Curt deletes spam comments, he deletes them with 3 billion fingers.
Tonight's Batman is the Xmas episode!
RT: @d00gZ - As someone who primarily reads and loves superhero comics, the new Blog@ crew is just damn embarrassing.
Philip Seymour Hoffman looks perfect to play John Byrne in the movie adaptation of John Byrne's life.
Wow, today was a great blogging day for me! http://thechrishaley.com/
Not pictured a toy I bought for my father : http://tinyurl.com/6hvs4p
Karate Kid meets You Got Served in Denmark : http://tinyurl.com/65yonk
Perfect review of Secret Invasion : "...a shallow character-free action comic." Via http://savagecritic.com/
I bought so many toys at lunch, you guys. So many.
More on the NEW Luthor/Brainiac "team-up" : http://tinyurl.com/5rnt7k
Is today new solicits day?
Let's Be Friends Again! In case you missed it : http://tinyurl.com/5k9xja
Why hasn't there been an Atom Ant/The Atom team-up yet?
Somebody stole my snack money out of my desk drawer. :(
So you were born in an electrical storm.. ♫ http://blip.fm/~15xxf
Keep some hope alive. ♫ http://blip.fm/~15xqz
It's almost too easy. ♫ http://blip.fm/~15xju
But at the same time, not really all that surprised.
Mind = blown http://tinyurl.com/64tf6r
Free DL of the best Xmas album ever - 8-Bit Jesus : http://tinyurl.com/78btva
You didn't tell me it was going to be buck-ass crazy mustard.
Re: DC Holiday Special - If you ever think your favorite DC-er is being poorly written, it could always be worse. Didio could take it over.
RT: @theisb - Above all, I thank Bill Mantlo for creating ROM, who cared enough to totally shoot a hooker in the face with his space laser.
I want a warm delicious lunch, but I also have a number of errands to run during the designated lunch time. What can I do?
Attn ARTISTS! : Anyone have a brand/particular scanner they swear by?
